casebody.data:
Evelyn TALLEY
v.
PRIDE MOBILITY PRODUCTS CORPORATION, Quality Home Healthcare, Inc., William S. Cameron, and Barbara B. Cameron No. 186P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Chris Kremer, Attorney at Law, for Talley, Evelyn. Todd A. King, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Pride Mobility Products Corporation. Rodney E. Pettey, Attorney at Law, Justin M. Osborn, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Quality Home Healthcare, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of June 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
